ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Generalized Deming regression, Theil-Sen regression and Passing-Bablock regression functions.
Generalized Deming regression, Theil-Sen regression and Passing-Bablock regression functions.

name: r-deming
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.4-1" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-deming
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/deming_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/deming/deming_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 86992a359b971617a032bddb09b3c084e458aa273fbb4a647d69617e7c5637ca

build:
  number: 2
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-boot
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-boot

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('deming')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('deming')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=deming
  license: LGPL-2.0-or-later
  summary: Generalized Deming regression, Theil-Sen regression and Passing-Bablock regression functions.
  license_family: LGPL
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/LGPL-2'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - brendanf

# Title: Deming, Theil-Sen, Passing-Bablock and Total Least Squares Regression
# Maintainer: Terry Therneau <therneau.terry@mayo.edu>
# Description: Generalized Deming regression, Theil-Sen regression and Passing-Bablock regression functions.
# Imports: boot
# Priority: optional
# Package: deming
# Version: 1.4
# LazyData: Yes
# Author: Terry Therneau
# License: LGPL (>= 2)
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2018-11-13 16:44:52 UTC; therneau
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2018-11-13 17:50:13 UTC
